languages.text: "Дайте знать мятежникам, что, если бунт не прекратится, я разбомблю планету. Устрашим их".
"Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."
languages.original_text: "Дайте знать мятежникам, что, если бунт не прекратится, я разбомблю планету. Устрашим их".

traits.locale_text: "Let the rebels know that if they will not stop the riot, I will bomb the planet. Let us intimidate them."
"Let the rebels know that if they will not stop the riot, I will bomb the planet. Let us intimidate them."
"Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."
"Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."
"Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."
"Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

languages.text: “告诉那些叛乱分子知道，如果他们不停止暴乱，我就用炸弹迫使他们屈服。到了那个时候，我会让他们知道什么叫真正的恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

traits.locale_text: “告诉那些叛乱分子知道，如果他们不停止暴乱，我就用炸弹迫使他们屈服。到了那个时候，我会让他们知道什么叫真正的恐惧。”

languages.text: «Que sepan los rebeldes que, si no detienen la revuelta, les bombardearé hasta la rendición. Les daremos algo que realmente teman».
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

traits.locale_text: «Que sepan los rebeldes que, si no detienen la revuelta, les bombardearé hasta la rendición. Les daremos algo que realmente teman».

languages.text: 「暴動を止めなければ、彼らを爆撃して服従させることになる、と反乱軍に伝えるんだ。奴らに真の恐怖を与えよう」
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

traits.locale_text: 「暴動を止めなければ、彼らを爆撃して服従させることになる、と反乱軍に伝えるんだ。奴らに真の恐怖を与えよう」

languages.text: « Faites savoir aux rebelles que s'ils ne mettent pas fin à l'émeute, je les enterre sous les bombes. Nous allons leur donner de bonnes raisons d'avoir peur ! »
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

traits.locale_text: « Faites savoir aux rebelles que s'ils ne mettent pas fin à l'émeute, je les enterre sous les bombes. Nous allons leur donner de bonnes raisons d'avoir peur ! »

languages.text: "Sagt den Rebellen, wenn sie den Aufstand nicht beenden, bombardiere ich sie. Wir geben ihnen etwas, was sie wirklich fürchten."
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt den Rebellen, wenn sie den Aufstand nicht beenden, bombardiere ich sie. Wir geben ihnen etwas, was sie wirklich fürchten."

languages.text: "İsyancılar bilsin ki başkaldırılarına son vermezlerse onlara bombalarla boyun eğdireceğim. Korkmak için sahih bir sebepleri olacak."
languages.original_text: "Let the rebels know that if they do not stop the riot, I will bomb them into submission. We will give them something to truly fear."
